heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit
heroes.bio_loc: Even the most contented Skywrath is an ill-tempered creature, naturally inclined to seek revenge for the slightest insult. But Vengeful Spirit is the essence of vengeance. Once a proud and savage Skywrath scion, Shendelzare was first in succession for the Ghastly Eyrie until a sister's treachery robbed her of her birthright. Snared in an assassin's net, Shendelzare tore free only at the cost of her wings, limping away in the ultimate humiliation: On foot. With her wings broken, she knew the Skywrath would never accept her as ruler; and in the highest roost of the Eyrie, inaccessible except by winged flight, her sister was untouchable. Unwilling to live as a flightless cripple, and desiring revenge far more than earthly power, the fallen princess drove a bargain with the goddess Scree'Auk: She surrendered her broken body for an imperishable form of spirit energy, driven by vengeance, capable of doing great damage in the material plane. She may spend eternity flightless, but she will have her revenge.
heroes.hype_loc: Vengeful Spirit's presence is felt at all times, whether she is alive or dead. Able to swap positions with any nearby hero, stun enemies, and reduce her killer's effectiveness if she falls, she constantly brings confusion and chaos to her foes.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Can swap herself with any nearby hero

facets.description_loc: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.
facets.name: vvengefulspirit_melee

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile
abilities.desc_loc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
abilities.lore_loc: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
abilities.shard_loc: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within %bounce_range_pct%%% of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.
facets_loc: Magic Missile deals %bonus_damage_per_lasthit% bonus damage for every creep the enemy has killed.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror
abilities.desc_loc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
abilities.lore_loc: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_command_aura
abilities.desc_loc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
abilities.lore_loc: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
abilities.scepter_loc: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_retribution
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever an enemy hero kills Vengeful Spirit, they get a debuff until their next death, causing Vengeful Spirit to deal %bonus_damage%%% bonus damage to them.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
abilities.desc_loc: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.
abilities.lore_loc: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
notes_loc: Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_vengeful_spirit_wave_of_terror_steal
talents.name_loc: Wave Of Terror Steals {s:bonus_steal_pct}% Of Reduced Damage And Armor

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_soul_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.
